very_easy.name: very_easy
very_easy.pl_desc: Najłatwiejsze zagadki z oczywistymi wskazówkami, zmniejszone punktowanie
very_easy.en_desc: Easiest puzzles with very obvious clues, reduced scoring
very_easy.prompt_hint: Make the facts extremely obvious and straightforward, with very clear hints from the beginning. Perfect for children or absolute beginners.

easy.name: easy
easy.prompt_hint: Make the facts very straightforward and obvious, suitable for beginners.

normal.name: normal
normal.prompt_hint: Balance the facts between obvious and subtle hints, suitable for average players.

hard.name: hard
hard.pl_desc: Bardziej wymagające zagadki, znacznie zwiększone punktowanie
hard.en_desc: More challenging puzzles, significantly increased scoring
hard.prompt_hint: Make the facts more subtle and clever, requiring good deduction skills. Avoid very obvious hints until the final fact.

expert.name: expert
expert.pl_desc: Najtrudniejsze zagadki z zawoalowanymi wskazówkami, maksymalne punktowanie
expert.en_desc: Hardest puzzles with cryptic clues, maximum scoring
expert.prompt_hint: Make the facts very cryptic, abstract, and challenging. Use metaphors, indirect references, and require deep thinking. Only the final fact should be somewhat direct.
